name: io/http/utils/Content type inserter
description:
Inserts content type into a HTTP request header.

Example:
1. {}@0 received via `headers`
2. "application/json"@0 received on `content type`
3. {"Content-Type": "application/json"}@0 sent via `headers`

d3b4259e-7ac5-47a5-8e09-48ea671fe5ee.name: headers

39712071-d20f-4899-96f7-03cf3e3cdd50.name: content type
39712071-d20f-4899-96f7-03cf3e3cdd50.description:
Receives the content type to be inserted into the headers.

Examples:
* "application/json"
* "text/plain"

a806d606-03a3-4918-a004-5069ef4cea06.name: headers
